Title: EPIC: Stage 1 — Improve demand forecasting by case type
Body: Window: 10 Nov 2025 → 9 Jan 2026 | Goal: dependable forecasts split by agreed case types with visuals & ranges.

Title: Agree case type definitions & tracking (10–21 Nov 2025)
Body: Scope: agree taxonomy + tracking; update data dictionary & mappings. Deliverables: /docs taxonomy, ETL mapping, sign-off. Start: 2025-11-10 | End: 2025-11-21

Title: Deliver improved forecasting by case type (24 Nov 2025 – 9 Jan 2026)
Body: Scope: implement forecasting split by case type; validate; publish dashboards. Deliverables: /src code, CI smoke tests, dashboard. Start: 2025-11-24 | End: 2026-01-09

Title: EPIC: Stage 2 — Model operational dynamics
Body: Window: 12 Jan 2026 → 3 Apr 2026 | Goal: model key operational dynamics building on Stage 1.

Title: Specific events (12–23 Jan 2026)
Body: Identify/model discrete events (policy/system). Outputs: event log schema, sensitivity toggles. Start: 2026-01-12 | End: 2026-01-23

Title: Track new cases from start (26 Jan – 6 Feb 2026)
Body: Ensure intake tracking from receipt. Outputs: intake pipeline update, CI checks. Start: 2026-01-26 | End: 2026-02-06

Title: Time intervals & task productivity (9–27 Feb 2026)
Body: Model service-time distributions & productivity. Outputs: interval notebooks, case_type×risk params. Start: 2026-02-09 | End: 2026-02-27

Title: Demand distribution by case type (2–13 Mar 2026)
Body: Link Stage 1 definitions to demand mix; allocation-ready splits. Outputs: demand mix tables, validation report. Start: 2026-03-02 | End: 2026-03-13

Title: Staff attrition & grade distribution (16 Mar – 3 Apr 2026)
Body: Quantify attrition and staffing by grade; feed staffing modules. Outputs: attrition scenarios, staffing inputs. Start: 2026-03-16 | End: 2026-04-03

Title: Decision: Simul8 vs Python (6–10 Apr 2026)
Body: Options appraisal and decision record. Outputs: decision paper (effort, risk, timeline) and Go/No-Go. Start: 2026-04-06 | End: 2026-04-10

Title: EPIC: Stage 3A — End-to-end (“concern to court”) with Simul8
Body: Window: 13 Apr 2026 → 31 Jul 2026 | Goal: faster delivery using Simul8 to explore capability, bottlenecks, policy interventions. Milestone: model ready by 31 Jul 2026.

Title: Capability analysis (13 Apr – 8 May 2026) — Simul8
Body: Stand up Simul8 baseline; assess system capability. Outputs: baseline build, calibration notes. Start: 2026-04-13 | End: 2026-05-08

Title: Identify bottlenecks & re-engineering (11 May – 5 Jun 2026) — Simul8
Body: Locate constraints; draft improvements. Outputs: diagnostics, improvement scenarios. Start: 2026-05-11 | End: 2026-06-05

Title: Layer policy interventions (8 Jun – 31 Jul 2026) — Simul8
Body: Design & test policy levers/prioritisation. Outputs: scenario pack, final model. Start: 2026-06-08 | End: 2026-07-31

Title: EPIC: Stage 3B — End-to-end (“concern to court”) with Python DES
Body: Window: 13 Apr 2026 → 25 Sep 2026 | Goal: build Python DES if Simul8 unavailable. Milestone: model ready by 25 Sep 2026.

Title: Capability analysis (13 Apr – 5 Jun 2026) — Python DES
Body: Stand up Python DES scaffolding and calibrate. Outputs: /src/sim scaffolding, calibration report. Start: 2026-04-13 | End: 2026-06-05

Title: Identify bottlenecks & re-engineering (8 Jun – 14 Aug 2026) — Python DES
Body: Run scenarios; propose improvements. Outputs: diagnostics, improvement scenarios. Start: 2026-06-08 | End: 2026-08-14

Title: Layer policy interventions (17 Aug – 25 Sep 2026) — Python DES
Body: Design & test policy levers/prioritisation. Outputs: scenario pack, final model. Start: 2026-08-17 | End: 2026-09-25
